article: The deep sea is not an easy place to live in . It ' s cold and dark . The deeper it is , the less sunlight there is . At about 3 , 000 feet , there is no light at all . It ' s very dark in the sea . Many fishes have no eyes , but some have big eyes . A few have eyes only on one side . Besides the coldness and the darkness , deep sea animals face a third danger - - other animals . Animals must find food to eat . Many animals eat plants , and some eat meat . This means these sea animals have two big jobs . One is that they need to find animals as their food , and the other is that they have to try not to become other animals ' meals . , . ( 5 )
questions: Sea animals have two jobs . They

model: need to find animals as food and eat .
need to find animals as food
need to find animals as food and have to try not to become other animals ' meals .
human: find friends and eat other animals
need to find animals and make friends
need to find animals as food and have to try not to become other animals ' meals .
